views.markdown:
This item is now Free

Compatible with iOS 10

Try it out with
Also available,

Move, resize, and rotate your lockscreen clock easily, just like you would move a snapchat emoji!

Features:
- Saves current clock position
- Save up to three clock positions
- Set clock alignment (left, center, right)
- Fine tune positioning
- Auto-align (with Haptic feedback)
- Vibrancy (see screenshots)
- Disable date subtitle
- Disable Press Home Text
- Disable Page Dots
- Disable scrolling on the lockscreen
- Change clock color (new feature!)
- Toggle edit mode with a long press (new feature!)

Note: TimeMover partially conflicts with HotDog. If HotDog is installed, the clock will not be rotatable.

Configure options from Settings.

Video Demonstration:

This item is now Free. Fixed long press edit mode and added a switch
Fixed gestures slightly
Added the ability to change the clock color
Added the ability to toggle edit mode from the lockscreen
Fixed "Error loading preferences bundle"
